sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_ba77bfe1db5f1300f72fe04a48961954
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reset Voice Mail Password">fa2cbd7bdb961300f72fe04a4896197a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:33ec31bbdb961300f72fe04a489619bc</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default from Requested For</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	
	//Get value from script include
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid',  newValue);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);
	function cbFtn(answer) {
		if (answer) {
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
			//Set short description of task
			var sc_item_request_display_name = 'Reset Voice Mail Password '+ retObj.username;
			g_form.setValue('sc_item_request_display_name', sc_item_request_display_name, sc_item_request_display_name);
			//Set Requested for organization
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company, retObj.company);
		}
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-14 21:43:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ba77bfe1db5f1300f72fe04a48961954</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default from Requested For</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ba77bfe1db5f1300f72fe04a48961954</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-14 22:38:49</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_e9c8c273dbd61300f72fe04a4896192b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reset Voice Mail Password">fa2cbd7bdb961300f72fe04a4896197a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:6d75cebfdb961300f72fe04a48961967</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Phone Number</name><order>300</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   var phoneno = /^\(?([0-9]{3})\)?[-. ]?([0-9]{3})[-. ]?([0-9]{4})$/;
   newValue = newValue.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '');
   var digits = newValue.length;
   if (newValue.match(phoneno))
 {
 var code = '';
 
 var area = newValue.substring(0, 3);
 var prefix = newValue.substring(3, 6);
 var line = newValue.substring(6);
 g_form.setValue('u_phone_number', '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line);
 g_form.hideFieldMsg("u_phone_number");	 
 }	
else
 {
 //alert("Please enter 10 digit phone number.");
 g_form.setValue('u_phone_number', oldValue);
//	  g_form.setValue('u_phone_number', "Please enter 10 digit phone number.");
	 g_form.showFieldMsg("u_phone_number", "Please enter 10 digit phone number.", "error");
return false;
 }
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-01 20:22:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e9c8c273dbd61300f72fe04a4896192b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Phone Number</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e9c8c273dbd61300f72fe04a4896192b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-14 22:38:33</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reset Voice Mail Password">fa2cbd7bdb961300f72fe04a4896197a</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default Values From Current User</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Default values using the current logged-In User
 * History
 * JIRA   Date         Developer       Description
 * -----  -----------  --------------  ------------------------
 * SB-203 10-Jun-2018  James Jose      Initial implementation
 *
 **/
function onLoad() {
	
	//Set organization based on the user
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	//Get value from script include at the server side
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid', userID);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);
	
	function cbFtn(answer) {
		if (answer) {
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
			//Set short description of task
			var sc_item_request_display_name = 'Reset Voice Mail Password for ' + retObj.username;  
			g_form.setValue('sc_item_request_display_name', sc_item_request_display_name, sc_item_request_display_name);
			//Set Requested for organization
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company, retObj.company);
		}
	}
	
}

		}
	}
}*/]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-11 16:45:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c245788bdb221300f72fe04a489619d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default Values From Current User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c245788bdb221300f72fe04a489619d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-14 22:39:28</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
